review_details: Small producer (10,000 bottles total- 2 whites and 1 red). Building dates back from 1350, beautiful rooftop looking at ocean with great breeze. A must do if visiting old town of Tinos (20 mins taxi drive 12 euros).
reviewFor: Tinos: Private tour at Ballis Boutique Winery

review_details: Must try their fruit yogurt- it is amazing. All of the pastries are fantastic- freshly made each morning. If staying in Imerovigli, it is a must stop for breakfast and pastry treats! Only downside is that they only accept cash (fairly common on the island).

We truly enjoyed our dinner at Avocado; the owner/manager was attentive and friendly. All of our four meals were delicious- traditional moussaka was one of the best I have ever tasted. Moderately priced at great location if you are staying on the cliff of SANTORINi.
The owner is warm and welcoming. The food is even better! We had two wonderful dinners during our 5 day stay in Santorini, and the price is reasonable as well. Great restaurant!
It was simply amazing- the winery is beautiful and the view is unparalleled. The wine and food pairing tasting was one the best winery experience we ever had. I highly recommend it.

Simply amazing!
The captain and her crew were wonderful. We caught so many fish in the net, shrimp in the traps as well as 2 octopus and an eel. We ate our catch for lunch- it was the most amazing experience. A must do if you have an overnight stay in Santorini.
